Todo

Crease angle

See also here, and here

const calcNormal = ( normals, normal, angle ) => {
    let allowed = normals.filter( n => n.angleTo( normal ) < angle * Math.PI / 180 )
    return allowed.reduce( (a, b) => a.clone().add( b ) ).normalize()
}
